kannada_original: ಈ ಗೇಯ ಈ ಭೂಮಿ ನನದೆಲ್ಲ ಎಂದೆನುತ
english_transliteration: Ī gēya ī bhūmi nanadella endenuta
english_translation: Saying, ""This song, this land, is all mine""
Why do you struggle, grieving in various ways?

kannada_original: ಇದ್ದಷ್ಟು ದಿನ ನಿನದು ಸಂತಸದ ಈ ಲೋಕ
english_transliteration: Iddaṣṭu dina ninadu santasada ī lōka
english_translation: For the days you exist, this world of happiness is yours
Offer salutations to Fate – Muddu Rāma.
